sn35.16:1.3: Yavata rupanam assado pannaya me so sudittho.
sn35.16:1.6: Yavata rupanam adinavo pannaya me so sudittho.
sn35.16:1.9: Yavata rupanam nissaranam, pannaya me tam sudittham.
sn35.16:1.16: Yavata dhammanam assado pannaya me so sudittho.
sn35.16:1.19: Yavata dhammanam adinavo pannaya me so sudittho.
sn35.16:1.22: Yavata dhammanam nissaranam, pannaya me tam sudittham.
sn35.16:2.1: Yavakivancaham, bhikkhave, imesam channam bahiranam ayatananam assadanca assadato, adinavanca adinavato, nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam nabbhannasim …pe… paccannasim.
sn35.16:2.3: ‘akuppa me vimutti, ayamantima jati, natthi dani punabbhavo’”ti.
